doc.title: A Journey to the Forbidden Land
doc.plot: Evan staying in a small town full with ambitions and dreams to make name in field of Entertainment, goes to the big city for his further studies. He meets two different girl Gloria and Julia, and unable to make the right choice of life selects Julia who is full with vices. So what happens to Evan is he able to get back to the right path and reaches his goal, Is he able to finish his studies or he makes a Journey to a forbidden Land, and never returns back to normal life.
